      This method returns the the Charset that is used to create writers.

      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings.

      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to ISO 8859 1.

      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16.
      SELF withUTF16BE()
      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16 big endian.
      SELF withUTF16LE()
      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16 little endian.

      This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-8.

    • Method Detail

      • getCharset

        public java.nio.charset.Charset getCharset()
        This method returns the the Charset that is used to create writers. It uses IOConfig.getDefaultCharset() by default.
        Returns:
        the charset to be used

      • withCharset

        public SELF withCharset(java.nio.charset.Charset charset)
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings.
        Parameters:
        charset - the charset that should be used
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withUTF8

        public SELF withUTF8()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-8.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withUTF16

        public SELF withUTF16()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withUTF16BE

        public SELF withUTF16BE()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16 big endian.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withUTF16LE

        public SELF withUTF16LE()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to UTF-16 little endian.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withASCII

        public SELF withASCII()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to ASCII.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withISO88591

        public SELF withISO88591()
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings to ISO 8859 1.
        Returns:
        this builder

      • withCharset

        public SELF withCharset(java.lang.String charsetName)
                 throws java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        This method sets the charset that is used by all methods that end up writing Strings. The given charsetName is resolved with Charset.forName(String). Often it is better to use withCharset(Charset) with the StandardCharsets helper class.
        Parameters:
        charsetName - the name of the charset that should be used
        Returns:
        this builder
        Throws:
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - If no support for the named charset is available in this instance of the Java virtual machine
